summary: This document is an email from Jeffrey Epstein to Jes Staley, sent on March 7, 2011. The email discusses a failed attempt to reach Staley on his cell phone and contains a confidentiality notice indicating that the communication may be privileged and confidential.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email, indicating a personal communication with Jes Staley.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is the recipient of the email, which discusses a personal matter between him and Epstein.

connections.description: The email indicates a personal communication between Epstein and Staley, suggesting a social or informal relationship.

keyFacts: The email was sent on March 7, 2011.
The communication is marked as confidential and may be attorney-client privileged.
Epstein attempted to contact Staley on his cell phone.
